chat_history.message: Hello, My product is an iPhone 13 with the above problem: Accidentally double-ordered. Many thanks for your help,

Dear ecomobile

please cancel the order.

Regards,
Aysu from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare, please relay the following message to the customer. 
 
Dear customer,

We are so sorry that you are unhappy with our product, as your product is still in transit, our logistics partner has suggested you to do the following.

1. Refuse the parcel when a delivery attempt is made.
2. If unable to refuse a parcel, do not open the product packaging. Use the return label provided by BackMarket and send the device back immediately.

By doing the following, you would be sure to receive a much FASTER REFUND for this order. 

Thank you.

Regards, 
JY

Hello Julia, You can find your return label attached to this message. Your return will be handled by Chronopost. Simply drop off your package at a drop-off location near you. You can find a list of locations here: Before preparing your return, please follow these steps: 1. Find instructions on how to return an item here 2. Don't forget to include any accessories that were delivered with your product 3. Remove any existing protective film or wrapping 4. Wrap your product and its accessories according to the tips below How to wrap your product: • The box should be sturdy and stable, and your product should fit snugly inside so it can't move during transport. • Attach the return label on top of the box (you can also attach a spare label inside for identification in case the original one is lost or damaged). • Take photos of the package from both inside and out before sending it. This will protect you in case your product gets damaged during transport. Your return is now ready to be dropped off! We'll let you know when it arrives at our facility. Best regards, Back Market Customer Care, Back Market Customer Care

Hi ecomobile,

Please refund the customer.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Fabio Back Market customer Care

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

We take note of the 2 day deadline for the refund. 

Regards,
TB

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JY
